intro_text: Your patrol catches scent of a mouse nearby.

success_text.unscathed_common: r_c locates the mouse and begins to stalk. The mouse nibbles on a seed, unaware of the hunting cat. r_c waggles {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} haunches and leaps, pinning the mouse beneath a paw as {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/make/makes} the killing bite.
success_text.unscathed_rare: r_c pinpoints the location of the prey and begins creeping forward. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP}{VERB/r_c/'re/'s} almost within pouncing distance when the mouse suddenly bolts. With a lash of {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} tail, r_c leaps after the mouse, barely snagging it before it reaches a burrow. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/purr/purrs} in satisfaction as prey-blood hits {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} tongue.

fail_text.unscathed_common: Your patrol narrowly misses the mouse.

decline_text: Your patrol ignores the mouse.

intro_text: Your patrol comes across a mouse.
decline_text: Your patrol ignores the mouse.

success_text.unscathed_common: r_c pounces on the mouse, with a squeak of surprise from both prey and apprentice.
success_text.unscathed_rare: app1 leaps onto the mouse, an easy kill! {PRONOUN/app1/subject/CAP}{VERB/app1/'re/'s} really getting the hang of hunting!

fail_text.unscathed_common: Your patrol narrowly misses the mouse.

intro_text: Your patrol comes across a large rat.

success_text.unscathed_common: Your patrol catches the rat! More fresh-kill!
success_text.unscathed_rare: The rat rears up and hisses at r_c, but while it's distracted, p_l takes it out with a quick strike.
success_text.stat_skill: The rat is huge and quick, but s_c is quicker, bringing it down just before it scurries out of reach. Everyone gathers around {PRONOUN/s_c/object} in congratulations of the skillful kill.

fail_text.unscathed_common: Your patrol misses the rat, and their confidence is shaken.

decline_text: Your patrol ignores the rat.

intro_text: Your patrol comes across a large hare.

success_text.unscathed_common: Your patrol catches the hare!
success_text.stat_skill: s_c runs the hare down in a huge display of athleticism and skill.

fail_text.unscathed_common: Your patrol narrowly misses the hare.

decline_text: Your patrol ignores the hare.

intro_text: Your patrol comes across a bird that's occupied scratching at the ground for insects.

success_text.unscathed_common: Your patrol catches the bird before it flies away!
success_text.unscathed_rare: r_c creeps towards the bird, setting {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} paws down gently. The bird notices the cat sneaking towards it and attempts to take off. r_c bounds forward and smacks the bird to the ground with an outstretched paw. Outstanding!

fail_text.unscathed_common: Your patrol narrowly misses the bird.

decline_text: Your patrol ignores the bird.

intro_text: Your patrol comes across a squirrel. It's engrossed in nibbling at a morsel beneath a tree.

success_text.unscathed_common: Stealthily, r_c stalks forward. The squirrel has no idea what's coming as the cat pounces on it and breaks its neck. r_c sends a silent thanks to StarClan for this prey.
success_text.unscathed_rare: r_c rapidly pads towards the squirrel, {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} tailtip twitching in excitement. The squirrel is alerted to their presence with a bird's alarm call, but r_c launches {PRONOUN/r_c/self} forward and cuts off its escape with a bite to the back of the head.

fail_text.unscathed_common: Your patrol narrowly misses the squirrel as it's alerted by a bird's alarm call.

decline_text: Your patrol ignores the squirrel.

intro_text: Your patrol glimpses the shadow of a fish as they pad past a stream.

success_text.unscathed_common: r_c very carefully walks to the water's edge and waits for {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} chance. When the fish is near, {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/hook/hooks} it out of the water with {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} claws. More fresh-kill!
success_text.unscathed_rare: r_c pads closer to the water's edge, careful to keep {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} shadow away from the water. The fish doesn't seem to notice {PRONOUN/r_c/object} and darts too close. r_c's paw flashes into the water and the fish flops onto the bank. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/kill/kills} it and happily {VERB/r_c/carry/carries} it back to camp.

fail_text.unscathed_common: The patrol moves too suddenly. The flickering shadow causes the fish to quickly vanish into murkier water.

decline_text: Your patrol ignores the fish.

intro_text: Your patrol sees the shadow of a school of fish in the river.
decline_text: Your patrol ignores the fish.

success_text.unscathed_common: p_l leads a successful fishing session, with almost everyone walking home with a fishy mouthful.
success_text.stat_skill: s_c makes fishing look easy, giving out tips to any interested cats.

fail_text.unscathed_common: The patrol moves too suddenly. The flickering shadow causes the fish to quickly vanish into murkier water.

intro_text: r_c spots a rabbit up ahead but it seems to be acting strange. The patrol can see its tremors from a few fox-lengths away.

success_text.unscathed_common: r_c catches the rabbit and it is eaten as normal.
success_text.unscathed_rare: r_c catches the rabbit, but when {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/report/reports} about the strange incident at camp, the dead rabbit is taken far away and buried.
success_text.stat_skill: s_c stops the patrol from catching the rabbit and takes the opportunity to teach them about illnesses that can pass from prey to cat.

fail_text.unscathed_common: r_c leaps for the rabbit but it still manages to slip away, despite its obvious illness.
fail_text.injury: r_c catches the rabbit, but later {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} and the cats who eat it become violently ill.

decline_text: r_c avoids catching the rabbit and looks for other prey.

history_text.reg_death: This cat died after eating tainted prey.

intro_text: A rabbit bursts out from cover, startled by the patrol.
decline_text: They watch it go, just as startled.

success_text.unscathed_common: The patrol rallies almost instantly, and manages to corner and catch the rabbit!
success_text.stat_skill: s_c reacts quickly, tearing off after the rabbit and slamming a paw on its head to bring it down.

fail_text.unscathed_common: Your patrol jumps after it, but the rabbit has too great of a head start.
fail_text.unscathed_stat: s_c is quicker than anyone else, tearing after the rabbit, but in {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} haste {PRONOUN/s_c/subject} {VERB/s_c/put/puts} a paw wrong and {VERB/s_c/stop/stops} as a sharp twinge of pain shoots up {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} leg.

intro_text: A rabbit bursts out from cover, startled by r_c.
decline_text: {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/watch/watches} it go, just as startled.

success_text.unscathed_common: r_c manages to corner and catch the rabbit!
success_text.stat_skill: s_c reacts quickly, tearing off after the rabbit and slamming a paw on its head to bring it down.

fail_text.unscathed_common: r_c jumps after it, but the rabbit has too great of a head start.
fail_text.unscathed_stat: s_c reacts quickly, tearing after the rabbit, but in {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} haste {PRONOUN/s_c/subject} {VERB/s_c/put/puts} a paw wrong and {VERB/s_c/stop/stops} as a sharp twinge of pain shoots up {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} leg.

intro_text: As the patrol spreads out to hunt, r_c admits {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/think/thinks} {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} had a vision from StarClan last night.
decline_text: The patrol doesn't talk about the vision.

success_text.unscathed_common: The patrol talks to {PRONOUN/r_c/object} about whether it was a real vision as they hunt.
success_text.unscathed_rare: p_l takes r_c aside, giving {PRONOUN/r_c/object} the full benefits of {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} seniority and experience as they discuss {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} vision.
success_text.stat_skill: s_c chooses to hunt with r_c, the spiritual warrior gently guiding the conversation. r_c feels deeply privileged and far more at peace after confiding in {PRONOUN/p_l/object}.

fail_text.unscathed_common: No one can make sense of the vision.
fail_text.unscathed_stat: r_c notices p_l looking at {PRONOUN/r_c/object} enviously, withdraws from the rest of the patrol, and dismisses the dream as unimportant.

intro_text: As {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/head/heads} out to hunt, r_c thinks about the dream {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} had last night... was it sent by StarClan?
decline_text: {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/push/pushes} it from {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} mind.

success_text.unscathed_common: It definitely distracts {PRONOUN/r_c/object} from the hunt, but r_c uses the time by {PRONOUN/r_c/self} to put {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} thoughts in order. It was a sign from {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} ancestors. Now {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/need/needs} to figure out what to do next.
success_text.unscathed_rare: Somehow hunting brings r_c to almost a meditative state, and not only {VERB/r_c/are/is} {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} fairly confident of {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} next steps having been given this vision, but {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} also {VERB/r_c/bring/brings} back a good haul to the prey pile.
success_text.stat_skill: s_c often feels like StarClan walks with {PRONOUN/s_c/object}, and this is just another instance on the path. {PRONOUN/s_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/s_c/use/uses} the solo patrol to collect {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} thoughts, and by the time {PRONOUN/s_c/subject} {VERB/s_c/pad/pads} home with a good catch, {PRONOUN/s_c/subject}{VERB/s_c/'re/'s} ready for the next step {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} vision hinted at.

fail_text.unscathed_common: r_c can't make sense of the vision.

intro_text: r_c is tempted to eat the prey {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} just caught.
decline_text: r_c decides against breaking the warrior code.

success_text.unscathed_common: {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/resist/resists} the temptation, going on to make a couple of great catches to make sure the elders are fed.
success_text.unscathed_rare: After all, {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/have/has} caught enough on this solo hunt that {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} won't be able to carry it all back to camp. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/stop/stops} for a quick snack and {VERB/r_c/return/returns} to camp laden with prey for the fresh-kill pile.

fail_text.unscathed_common: r_c gives in to {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} grumbling belly, reasoning that no one will notice, but when {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/arrive/arrives} back at camp empty-pawed and with blood on {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} lips, {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/feel/feels} the stares of the other warriors on {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} pelt.

intro_text: r_c is tempted to eat the prey {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} just caught.
decline_text: r_c decides against breaking the warrior code.

success_text.unscathed_common: {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/resist/resists} the temptation, going on to make a couple of great catches to make sure the elders are fed.
success_text.unscathed_rare: After all, {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/have/has} caught enough on this solo hunt that {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} won't be able to carry it all back to camp. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/stop/stops} for a quick snack and {VERB/r_c/return/returns} to camp laden with prey for the fresh-kill pile.

fail_text.unscathed_common: r_c gives in to {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} grumbling belly, reasoning that no one will notice, but when {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/arrive/arrives} back at camp empty-pawed and with blood on {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} lips, {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/feel/feels} the stares of the warriors on {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} pelt. r_c slinks back to the apprentices' den, tail and ears low.

intro_text: r_c is tempted to eat the prey {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} just caught.
decline_text: r_c decides against breaking the warrior code.

success_text.unscathed_common: {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/resist/resists} the temptation, going on to make a couple of great catches to make sure the elders are fed.
success_text.unscathed_rare: After all, the patrol has caught enough on this hunt that {PRONOUN/r_c/subject}'ll have trouble carrying it all back to camp. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/stop/stops} for a quick snack and {VERB/r_c/return/returns} to camp laden with prey for the fresh-kill pile.

fail_text.unscathed_common: r_c gives in to {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} grumbling belly, reasoning that no one will notice, but when the patrol reforms and r_c arrives back empty-pawed with blood on {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} lips, {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/feel/feels} the suspicious stares of the other warriors on {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} pelt.
fail_text.unscathed_stat: {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/think/thinks} {PRONOUN/r_c/subject}{VERB/r_c/'ve/'s) gotten away with {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} clandestine snacking, but when r_c arrives back at camp, another patrol member pulls the deputy aside for a quiet word, glaring back at r_c. The deputy assigns {PRONOUN/r_c/object} to dig a new trench for the Clan's dirtplace, and r_c hears snide remarks when {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/slink/slinks} in to {PRONOUN/r_c/object} nest that night.

intro_text: r_c is tempted to eat the prey {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} just caught.
decline_text: r_c decides against breaking the warrior code.

success_text.unscathed_common: {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/eat/eats} the prey without anyone noticing.
success_text.unscathed_rare: After all, the patrol has caught enough on this hunt that {PRONOUN/r_c/subject}'ll have trouble carrying it all back to camp. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/stop/stops} for a quick snack and {VERB/r_c/return/returns} to camp laden with prey for the fresh-kill pile.

fail_text.unscathed_common: {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/think/thinks} {PRONOUN/r_c/subject}{VERB/r_c/'ve/'s) gotten away with {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} clandestine snacking, but when r_c arrives back at camp, another patrol member pulls the deputy aside for a quiet word, glaring back at r_c. The deputy assigns {PRONOUN/r_c/object} to dig a new trench for the Clan's dirtplace; r_c prickles with humiliation and terrible smells.

intro_text: The patrol hears a lot of barking and commotion.
decline_text: p_l makes the decision to go to another part of the territory to hunt. {PRONOUN/p_l/subject/CAP} {VERB/p_l/want/wants} no part of this ruckus.

success_text.unscathed_common: The patrol silently creeps towards the noise. They discover several dogs gnawing on a deer carcass with their Twolegs shouting at them in apparent anger. The Twolegs grab the dogs and drag them away, their whines softly disappearing in the distance. p_l can't help but feel thankful to the dogs; c_n will eat well for several days to come.
success_text.unscathed_rare: p_l and the patrol pause and snicker when they see some Twolegs' attempt to catch several dogs gnawing on a deer carcass. As the Twolegs catch the dogs and leave, the patrol begins snacking on the carcass. A soft bleating noise nearby notifies them of the presence of the deer's still nursing fawn. They return to c_n with the fawn's carcass, proud and tall.

fail_text.unscathed_common: Following the noises, they see dogs eating a deer and Twolegs trying to catch them. Soon, the beasts are caught and the patrol goes to check out the deer. Suddenly, the sound of barking reaches their ears and as the dogs come back into view, the patrol scatters! p_l has to spend the whole day gathering the patrol rather than hunting.

intro_text: It's time. r_c has reached the age of six moons and is sent into the woods to prove their worth. Shaking, they step out of the safety of the camp.
decline_text: They can't do this. Not today.

success_text.unscathed_common: r_c arrives back to camp, tail between their legs, but they are safe. They have proved their worth, and the woods have spared them today.
success_text.unscathed_rare: r_c arrives back to camp, tail high. The woods have been kind to them today, and they state that their trial was nothing more than a quiet walk in the forest.

fail_text.death: The day turns into night and r_c still hasn't returned. The woods have decided that they are not worthy.

intro_text: r_c, upon their sixth moon, steps into the cool shadows of the woods. Their eyes full of determination and fear, they disappear into the dense forest to undertake the trial.
decline_text: They can't do this. Not today.

success_text.unscathed_common: Returning exhausted and with a weary gaze, r_c pushes through the foliage into the camp. They have survived the ordeal, earning the woods' acceptance and their place as an apprentice.
success_text.unscathed_rare: r_c returns to camp, not a whisker out of place, their coat glistening in the sunlight. They tell of a peaceful journey, almost as if the woods had welcomed them.

fail_text.death: The moon hangs high, the camp waits in silence, but r_c does not return. The creatures of the woods have claimed them, finding them not worthy.

intro_text: r_c, now of age, steps towards the ominous woods. With a final glance back at the camp, they slip into the dark undergrowth, beginning their test.
decline_text: They can't do this. Not today.

success_text.unscathed_common: Bedraggled but alive, r_c emerges from the woods. They have been tested, and proven themselves worthy of the woods, ready to begin their life as an apprentice.
success_text.unscathed_rare: With confident strides, r_c exits the woods, their eyes glinting with triumph. The woods, it seems, have found a special favor with them today.

fail_text.death: Night descends, and r_c is nowhere to be seen. It's a bitter truth the camp must accept, the woods have judged, and r_c was found wanting.

intro_text: The time has come for r_c to face their destiny in the woods. With courage in their eyes, they step into the mystical forest.
decline_text: They can't do this. Not today.

success_text.unscathed_common: Staggering into the camp, r_c shows signs of a tough journey, but they have succeeded. The woods have tested and accepted them.
success_text.unscathed_rare: Striding out of the woods, r_c radiates calm and confidence. It's as if they have danced with the woods, becoming its favorite for the day.

fail_text.death: The night falls, and with it, the hope of r_c's return. The woods have made their decision; they have claimed r_c.

intro_text: r_c, at their sixth moon, bravely enters the woods, ready to face whatever trial the woods have for them.
decline_text: They can't do this. Not today.

success_text.unscathed_common: Tired but triumphant, r_c reappears at the camp, having proven their worth to the capricious woods. They are now ready for their apprentice training.
success_text.unscathed_rare: Almost unreal, r_c returns from the woods unscathed, as if they had a peaceful stroll. The woods have shown them a rare favor.

fail_text.death: As the night blankets the camp, r_c doesn't return. The camp must accept the harsh reality that the woods have not deemed r_c worthy.
